## DefaultEnvAdapter.getCollisionObjects() method

Get a list of objects that the laser pointer will not penetrate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCollisionObjects(): THREE.Object3D[] | undefined;
```
**Returns:**

THREE.Object3D\[\] \| undefined

For XR Controllers
